module.name: SMOS Product Reader
module.description: The SMOS Product Reader provides the capability of reading data products acquired by ESA's SMOS mission; supported products are: L1C Browse, L1C Science, L2 SM, L2 OS as well as SMOS auxiliary data for LAI, ECMWF, VTEC-C, and VTEC-P.
